close_door_tips.WAV.english: Please close the microwave oven door first.

download_avatar.WAV.english: The new avatar is loading, please wait

error_recognition_boy.WAV.chinese: 努力寻找方案中，请稍等

error_recognition_danbao.WAV.english: I'm trying to find a recipe. Please wait a moment

error_recognition_girl.WAV.english: Please wait while we search for a recipe

failed_empty.WAV.chinese: 请检查是否已放入食物
failed_empty.WAV.english: Please check if the food has been put in

failed_move_food.WAV.chinese: 食物识别失败，请移动一下食物后重试
failed_move_food.WAV.english: Food recognition failed. Please move the food and try again

failed_network_error.WAV.chinese: 网络异常请，检查网络并尝试再次开关门
failed_network_error.WAV.english: Network abnormality, please check the network and try opening or closing the door again

failed_not_support.WAV.chinese: 暂不支持组合菜品建模
failed_not_support.WAV.english: Cannot support modeling of combination dishes

failed_no_food.WAV.chinese: 菜品不存在，请检查食品
failed_no_food.WAV.english: The dish does not exist. Please check the food.

failed_reboot.WAV.chinese: 食物识别失败，请重启后再试
failed_reboot.WAV.english: Food recognition failed. Please restart and try again

failed_reopen_door.WAV.chinese: 识别失败，请开炉门重试一下
failed_reopen_door.WAV.english: Recognition failed,  please open the microwave oven door first and try again

failed_search.WAV.chinese: 识别失败，主人试试手动搜索菜谱吧
failed_search.WAV.english: Recognition failed, master. Try  to search for recipes manually

failed_upgrade.WAV.chinese: 炉端程序过旧，请联系管理员升级
failed_upgrade.WAV.english: The programe is too old, please contact the administrator to upgrade

network_exception.WAV.chinese: 网络异常，请更换网络后再尝试
network_exception.WAV.english: Network abnormality, please replace the network and try again

no_net_boy.WAV.chinese: 小万接受不到信号了，主人先检查一下网络吧
no_net_boy.WAV.english: Xiao Wan can't receive the signal. Master, please check the network first
